    level="1"
    right="Feat 15"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reveal Machinations](/Feats.aspx?ID=924) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You reveal that you played a minor but recurring role in another humanoid’s life—or at least convince them that’s the case. Attempt a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check against the target’s Will DC. On a success, the revelation makes them [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 2, and on a critical success they are frightened 3. In addition, you gain information about the subject as though you had attempted to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about them using an appropriate skill and received the same result on your roll. You can’t use this ability against the same humanoid again until 1 day has passed and you’ve also successfully disguised yourself as a different person.

**Special** At the GM’s discretion, this feat can be used against non-humanoids if they have regular contact with humanoids or you are able to disguise yourself as a member of the target’s ancestry or type of creature.

<title level="2">Lacunafex Lore</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 72</row>

If the PCs earn Mialari Docur's trust and prove their worth by defeating the Scarlet Triad, she rewards them by granting them access to several feats and spells she and her students have developed over the years.

**Related Feats**: [Different Worlds](/Feats.aspx?ID=923), [Secret Speech](/Feats.aspx?ID=925), [Silver's Refrain](/Feats.aspx?ID=926), [Tweak Appearances](/Feats.aspx?ID=927)
